articles.author: Nichola Saminather
articles.title: UPDATE 1-Canada's Manulife hopes to tap into Asia's growth in wealth - Reuters
articles.description: Manulife Financial Corp has raised the proportion of core profit it aims to earn from its fastest-growing businesses, including asset management and its operations in Asia, where it hopes to capitalize on the continent's rapid growth in wealth.
articles.content:
(Adds comments from investor day, share price)
TORONTO, June 29 (Reuters) - Manulife Financial Corp has raised the proportion of core profit it aims to earn from its fastest-growing businesses, incl… [+2329 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Canada will share up to 100 mln doses of COVID-19 vaccine with nations in need - source - Reuters
articles.description: Canada will share up to 100 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines with countries in need, though a portion of this has already been announced, a government official said on Friday, adding that the domestic vaccination campaign will not be affected.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: Empty vials of the Pfizer-BioNTech coronavirus disease (COVID-19) vaccine are seen at The Michener Institute, in Toronto, Canada January 4, 2021. REUTERS/Carlos Osorio/F… [+622 chars]

articles.author: Anna Mehler Paperny
articles.title: Canadian First Nation finds 751 unmarked graves at former residential school - Reuters
articles.description: A First Nation in Canada's Saskatchewan province said on Thursday it has found the unmarked graves of 751 people at a now-defunct residential school, just weeks after a similar discovery in British Columbia rocked the country.
articles.content: The area of the Marieval Indian Residential School is seen in an undated map on the Cowessess Reserve near Grayson, Saskatchewan, Canada. National Centre for Truth and Reconciliation/Handout via REUT… [+792 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: In vigil remembering Canadian Muslim family, a vow that 'this is our city' - Reuters
articles.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau joined several thousand mourners  in a vigil Tuesday evening to remember three generations of a Canadian Muslim family killed in what police said was a premeditated hate crime, as a grieving community stood united in the midst of…

articles.author: Nichola Saminather
articles.title: TD Bank CFO Ahmed to head securities unit, move seen as CEO succession play - Reuters
articles.description: TD Bank Group (TD.TO) on Thursday named Chief Financial Officer Riaz Ahmed chief executive of its securities unit and head of wholesale banking, a move some investors interpreted as a sign he will succeed CEO Bharat Masrani.
